title: AVNL Notification 2025 - Apply Offline for 06 Consultant, Manager Posts
description: The Armoured Vehicles Nigam Limited (AVNL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Consultant, Senior Consultant, Senior Manager, and Junior Manager Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, Diploma in Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical Engineering, MBA, and PGDM can apply for the AVNL Notification 2025. The interested applican...
